newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Lisbon Expo '98 head offers to resign - source.
newsitem.headline: Lisbon Expo '98 head offers to resign - source.

text.p: The chief organiser of the Expo 1998 World Fair in Lisbon, Antonio Cardoso e Cunha, has offered his resignation to Socialist Prime Minister Antonio Guterres, an official source said.
"Cardoso e Cunha has presented his resignation offer in a letter to the Prime Minister," the source told Reuters.
Guterres, visiting Rome, was not immediately available to comment.

Press reports said officials were angry when Cardoso e Cunha told them that the Expo 1998 World Fair would cost the government more than initial estimates. Cardoso e Cunha was appointed by the previous Social Democrat government. (( -- Lisbon newsroom +351-1-3538254))
